awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Estimation of a Distribution or      Survival Function
awd_abstract_narration: Research will be conducted on statistical nonparametric                    estimation problems about survival functions and distribution                   functions. Minimax estimators will be obtained for a range of                   loss functions for an unknown survival function in the presence                 of right-censored data. The loss functions include Cramer-von                   Mises type loss functions whose weights are  Beta densities. The                admissibility of the best invariant estimator of a distribution                 function will be examined under a similar class of loss                         functions. Corresponding questions will be examined for the case                of Kolmogorov-Smirnov loss functions.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION FOR THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
